testcase.name: Integration Test: API Health > GET /health should return 200 OK

[DB:n062a7] Initializing database at :memory: Connected to the SQLite database. Created billing tables and seeded default subscription plans. Seeded SuperAdmin and DBR77 Users.
Projects table created successfully (or already exists).
Database initialization complete.

testcase.name: Integration Test: API Health > GET /non-existent-route should return 404 (handled by catchall serving index.html)
Integration Test: Full API Flow > Project Lifecycle > should create, read, update, and delete a project
Integration Test: Full API Flow > Task Lifecycle > should create and manage tasks
Integration Test: Full API Flow > Session Management > should save and retrieve session data
Auth Integration > should login successfully with valid credentials
Auth Integration > should fail with invalid credentials
Auth Integration > should require email and password
Auth Integration > should validate token via /api/auth/me
Integration Test: Database Health > Connection Health > should connect to database successfully
Integration Test: Database Health > Connection Health > should have all required tables
Integration Test: Database Health > Referential Integrity > should enforce foreign key constraints
Integration Test: Database Health > Referential Integrity > should cascade delete correctly
Integration Test: Database Health > Query Performance > should execute simple SELECT queries quickly
Integration Test: Database Health > Query Performance > should execute JOIN queries efficiently
Integration Test: Database Health > Query Performance > should handle concurrent queries
Integration Test: Database Health > Transaction Integrity > should commit transactions successfully
Integration Test: Database Health > Transaction Integrity > should rollback transactions on error
Integration Test: Database Health > Data Consistency > should prevent duplicate emails
Integration Test: Database Health > Data Consistency > should maintain referential integrity on updates
Initiatives Integration > should list initiatives
Initiatives Integration > should create an initiative
Integration Test: LLM Health > Connection Tests > should test provider connection successfully
Integration Test: LLM Health > Connection Tests > should handle connection timeout gracefully
Integration Test: LLM Health > Connection Tests > should handle invalid provider gracefully
Integration Test: LLM Health > Latency Tests > should measure LLM call latency
Integration Test: LLM Health > Latency Tests > should handle concurrent LLM calls
Integration Test: LLM Health > Quality Tests > should respect system instructions
Integration Test: LLM Health > Quality Tests > should handle context history correctly
Integration Test: LLM Health > Error Handling > should handle API errors gracefully
